SELECT reviewno,ptno,"regDate",score,content,userno,trainerno,schedulecount,name,profileImg,group_no,order_no,"trainerName","trainerImg" FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rn,reviewno,ptno,"regDate",score,content,userno,trainerno,schedulecount,name,profileImg,group_no,order_no,"trainerName","trainerImg" FROM(SELECT r.reviewno,r.ptno,TO_CHAR(r.regdate, 'YYYY/MM/DD')as "regDate",r.score,r.content, p.userno,p.trainerno,s.schedulecount,u.name,u.profileImg,r.group_no,r.order_no, tra.name as "trainerName",tra.img as "trainerImg"
FROM review r,pt p,(SELECT ptNo, COUNT(scheduleNo) scheduleCount FROM schedule group by ptNo)s,users u,(SELECT name as name,profileimg as Img,userno FROM users WHERE usertype = 'trainer')tra where r.ptno = p.ptno and p.ptno = s.ptno and u.userno = p.userno and p.trainerno = tra.userno and p.trainerno= #{trainerNo} ORDER BY r.group_no DESc,r.order_no ASC)) where rn>=(#{page}*#{pageView}-#{pageView}+1) and rn<=(#{page}*#{pageView})
SELECT count(reviewno) FROM review r,pt p where r.ptno = p.ptno and p.trainerno = #{trainerNo}
